author: gartung
body: Running the FWLITE build on ElCapitan with SIP enabled showed that the library ID was being set to the relative path in the tmp directory. This changes the install_name_tool function to use @rpath/libname and adds a new function install_name_tool_rpath which adds the lib productstore as an rpath. This rpath can be changed later if needed.
title: Add rule on macOS to use library ID @rpath/libname and to add lib productstore as an rpath.
